title: Five key Brexit groups that will define Boris Johnson’s premiership
text:
The next few days will define Boris Johnson’s premiership as he seeks a Brexit deal at a summit of EU leaders in Brussels and tries to persuade MPs to back it – all before Oct 31. We analyse what he must do to win over the key groups.

Brexiteers

Eurosceptic ministers are prepared to resign if Mr Johnson delivers a deal that does not mean leaving the European Union, The Daily Telegraph has been told.

Such a drastic course of action may not be necessary after members of the European Research Group of Conservative MPs spent an hour yesterday in Downing Street for talks about the deal.
description: The next few days will define Boris Johnson’s premiership as he seeks a Brexit deal at a summit of EU leaders in Brussels and tries to persuade MPs to back it – all before Oct 31.
